column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]]'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Christina Scull]]

column1: *'''Publication:''' A description of the letter was included in ''[[Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 1 June 2009]]''.
[Description and excerpt:] "In December 1959 [Tolkien] complains that he finds 'compulsory retirement both distressing
